name: Association des Producteurs Europeens de Potasse
goal: Representation of the EU Potash Industry vis-à-vis the European institutions and national governments in all questions concerning the EU Potash Industry
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Trade
euInitiatives: Revision of the Fertilizer Regulation and implementation,  revision of the Emission Trading System, Environmental questions (water and waste Directives), Member of the Sectoral Social Dialogue of the Extractive Industry (SSDEI)
